Name: pepeizq's Cities
About the game: Introduction The game has been designed with the purpose that anyone can enter the world of 'city builders' with simple mechanics to understand even if these games are not your thing. Purpose The goal of the game is to grow the city to the limits of the map, for that purpose the player must earn money by growing the population while has enough food and work to sustain it. Every hour in the game will be calculated new income and movements of population, work and food, if you spend a lot of money you will have to wait '1 hour' to receive new income.
